name: Gem Galaxy
description:
Decorate the board by stratetically placing gems to build up your highscore.

The game consists of a 12x8 sized board. 6 different gems are already placed down. Your goal is to place additionally gems next to them. But be careful. You can only place them if they share the same color or form with their neighbours.
Can you manage to lay down all gems and reach the top score?
